articles.description: JAN MOIR: For over two hours the Platinum Party was the best of us, it was the worst of us, it was glorious and victorious - but also just a bit spurious.
articles.content:
The Platinum Party at the Palace started off with a high tea of hilarity, when Paddington and the Queen shared marmalade sandwiches and a moment this country is never going to forget.
But how to top… [+4172 chars]

articles.content:
WHAT a wonderful long weekend it was.
